snippet: Victor Estrella Burgos of the Dominican Republic rallied from a set down to beat Thomaz Bellucci of Brazil 4-6, 7-6 (5), 6-2 on Sunday to retain his title on clay in the Ecuador Open in Quito....
lead_paragraph: Victor Estrella Burgos of the Dominican Republic rallied from a set down to beat Thomaz Bellucci of Brazil 4-6, 7-6 (5), 6-2 on Sunday to retain his title on clay in the Ecuador Open in Quito.

headline.print_headline: Victor Estrella Burgos Retains His Ecuador Open Title
headline.main: Victor Estrella Burgos Retains His Ecuador Open Title
